actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing members of the Joint Committee on Printing and members of the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.

summary.text: Elects the following Members of the House of Representatives to the Joint Committee on Printing: Mr. Gaydos, of Pennsylvania; Mr. Jones, of Tennessee; Mr. Badham, of California; and Mr. Roberts of Kansas. Elects the following Members of the House to the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library: Mr. Swift, of Washington; Ms. Oakar, of Ohio; Mr. Gingrich, of Georgia; and Mr. Roberts, of Kansas.

titles.title: A resolution electing members of the Joint Committee on Printing and members of the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.
